mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO data_tb ( pvs, uvs, ips, create_date, news_id ) VALUES (#{pvs}, #{uvs}, #{ips}, #{createDate}, #{newsId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE data_tb SET pvs=#{pvs}, uvs=#{uvs}, ips=#{ips}, create_date=#{createDate}, news_id=#{newsId} WHERE data_id=#{dataId}
mapper.select: SELECT data_id, pvs, uvs, ips, create_date, news_id FROM data_tb WHERE data_id=#{dataId}
SELECT data_id, pvs, uvs, ips, create_date, news_id FROM data_tb ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
